name: io.github.pab1it0/prometheus-mcp-server
title: Prometheus MCP Server
description: MCP server providing Prometheus metrics access and PromQL query execution for AI assistants

environmentVariables.name: PROMETHEUS_URL
environmentVariables.description: Prometheus server URL (required unless PROMETHEUS_TENANTS is set)

environmentVariables.name: PROMETHEUS_URL_SSL_VERIFY
environmentVariables.description: Set to False to disable SSL verification

environmentVariables.name: PROMETHEUS_DISABLE_LINKS
environmentVariables.description: Set to True to disable Prometheus UI links in query results (saves context tokens in MCP clients)

environmentVariables.name: ORG_ID
environmentVariables.description: Organization ID for multi-tenant Prometheus setups

environmentVariables.name: PROMETHEUS_TENANTS
environmentVariables.description: JSON array of tenant configs (name, url, optional auth fields)

environmentVariables.name: PROMETHEUS_DEFAULT_TENANT
environmentVariables.description: Default tenant name when PROMETHEUS_TENANTS is configured

environmentVariables.name: PROMETHEUS_MCP_SERVER_TRANSPORT
environmentVariables.description: MCP server transport type (stdio, http, or sse)

environmentVariables.name: PROMETHEUS_CUSTOM_HEADERS
environmentVariables.description: Custom headers as JSON string to include in Prometheus requests
